channel.title: Kungfu on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Kungfu on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: wow. today was crazy
item.description: so after a week of work that last about 64+ hours I am about to fall asleep - even though I went to bed soo damned early last night that I don’t remember seeing the sunrise. haha. umm. everything is sorta breaking. every couple months I get the feeling that the ceiling is falling. but. I don’t care ;) haha. I will hoist it back up. so my site is almost done.
